prea.recommender.llorma
Class SingletonParallelLLORMA

java.lang.Object
  prea.recommender.llorma.SingletonParallelLLORMA
All Implemented Interfaces:
Recommender
public class SingletonParallelLLORMA
extends java.lang.Object
implements Recommender

A class implementing Local Low-Rank Matrix Approximation. Technical detail of the algorithm can be found in Joonseok Lee and Seungyeon Kim and Guy Lebanon and Yoram Singer, Local Low-Rank Matrix Approximation, Proceedings of the 30th International Conference on Machine Learning, 2013.

Since:
2013. 6. 11
Version:
1.2
Author:
Joonseok Lee

Constructor Detail

SingletonParallelLLORMA

public SingletonParallelLLORMA(int uc,
                               int ic,
                               double max,
                               double min,
                               int fc,
                               double lr,
                               double r,
                               int iter,
                               int mm,
                               int kt,
                               double kw,
                               RegularizedSVD base,
                               SparseMatrix tm,
                               int ml,
                               boolean verbose)
Construct a matrix-factorization-based model with the given data.

Parameters:
uc - The number of users in the dataset.
ic - The number of items in the dataset.
max - The maximum rating value in the dataset.
min - The minimum rating value in the dataset.
fc - The number of features used for describing user and item profiles.
lr - Learning rate for gradient-based or iterative optimization.
r - Controlling factor for the degree of regularization.
iter - The maximum number of iterations.
mm - The maximum number of local models.
kt - Type of kernel used in kernel smoothing.
kw - Width of kernel used in kernel smoothing.
base - A global SVD model used for calculating user/item similarity.
tm - A reference to test matrix.
verbose - Indicating whether to show iteration steps and train error.

Evaluate the designated algorithm with the given test data.

Specified by:
evaluate in interface Recommender
Parameters:
testMatrix - The rating matrix with test data.
Returns:
The result of evaluation, such as MAE, RMSE, and rank-score.

getUserSimilarity

public double getUserSimilarity(int idx1,
                                int idx2)
Calculate similarity between two users, based on the global base SVD.

Parameters:
idx1 - The first user's ID.
idx2 - The second user's ID.
Returns:
The similarity value between two users idx1 and idx2.

getItemSimilarity

public double getItemSimilarity(int idx1,
                                int idx2)
Calculate similarity between two items, based on the global base SVD.

Parameters:
idx1 - The first item's ID.
idx2 - The second item's ID.
Returns:
The similarity value between two items idx1 and idx2.

kernelSmoothing

private SparseVector kernelSmoothing(int size,
                                     int id,
                                     int kernelType,
                                     double width,
                                     boolean isItemFeature)
Given the similarity, it applies the given kernel. This is done either for all users or for all items.

Parameters:
size - The length of user or item vector.
id - The identifier of anchor point.
kernelType - The type of kernel.
width - Kernel width.
isItemFeature - return item kernel if yes, return user kernel otherwise.
Returns:
The kernel-smoothed values for all users or all items.
